archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Formalize agreed actions and decisions
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Decisions with justification to be made official with responsible roles assigned.
Crisis Manager creates and sends the report to GEM and Group Legal, Risk, Security and Privacy by utilizing ManageBridge template “Send CMT Report to GEM”.
Recurring meetings agrees the meeting agenda. The agenda contains at least status reporting, decisions and actions, risk acceptance, possible resource priorities and Crisis Level 2 summary for Global Crisis Management team.
